001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004
005public class CommandLineParser {
006  private final String name;
007  private final String gender;
008  private final String gpa;
009  private final ArrayList<String> classes = new ArrayList<>();
010
011  public CommandLineParser(String... args) {
012    if (args.length < 3) {
013      throw new Student.MissingCommandLineArgumentsException();
014    }
015
016    this.name = args[0];
017    this.gender = args[1];
018    this.gpa = args[2];
019
020    for (int i = 3; i < args.length; i++) {
021      this.classes.add(args[i]);
022    }
023  }
024
025  public Student createStudent() {
026    return new Student(name, classes, parseGpa(), gender);
027  }
028
029  protected double parseGpa() {
030    double gpa;
031    try {
032      gpa = Double.parseDouble(this.gpa);
033
034    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
035      throw new Student.InvalidGpaException(this.gpa);
036    }
037    return gpa;
038  }
039
040}
